name: INRequestRideIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for booking a ride for the user.

items.name: func resolvePickupLocation(for: INRequestRideIntent, with: (INPlacemarkResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the pickup location for the ride.

items.name: func resolveScheduledPickupTime(for: INRequestRideIntent, with: (INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the pickup time for the ride.

items.name: func resolveDropOffLocation(for: INRequestRideIntent, with: (INPlacemarkResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the drop-off location for the ride.

items.name: func resolveRideOptionName(for: INRequestRideIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the userâ€™s selected ride option.

items.name: func resolvePartySize(for: INRequestRideIntent, with: (INIntegerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the number of passengers for the ride.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INRequestRideIntent, completion: (INRequestRideIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can book the ride.

items.name: func handle(intent: INRequestRideIntent, completion: (INRequestRideIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the booking of the ride.
